attributes.action: Ensure RBS can no longer sponsor sporting events at cost to the tax payer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: RBS currently sponsor several sporting events, including, Rugby, Golf, F1. We need to know how this is affecting the tax payer. Surely a bank which has recorded a huge loss cannot afford to continue to do this. I ask for a stop to this sponsorship, or at the least make it public knowledge of this outgoings and therefor incomings of these.
